turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Wanda, can you order me a couple pizzas from the Screamin Banchie Pizza place?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sure, Tell me what you want, I'm looking at their website now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I need two of the largest ones they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok the biggest they have is 14 inches.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I will need three then. Do they have make your own or menu ones

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have both, but the menu ones are cheaper especially if you want a lot of toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok What if I want Just a pepperoni and sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That we'd have to do a build your own.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok great so lets do one of those, and do they have a margherita type?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok Lets do one of those, and then you suprize me with the next one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will choose a chicken one and watch out its spicey

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so I have 3 pizzas, and sausage and pepperoni build your own, a margherita, and a spicy chicken one, any thing else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok and what is the estimated price?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: around 45.00

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok, and when will this be ready

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They say it will be about 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok sounds great Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome.
